title: Set a Travel Notification
description: A customer is traveling internationally and wants to put a travel notification on their credit card to avoid it being blocked.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and the card they will be using.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the customer and their credit card account.

tasks.description: Collect the travel details: countries and dates of travel.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately records the travel itinerary.

tasks.description: Add the travel notification to the account in the fraud monitoring system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sets the travel notice.
